docs.snippet: Almost none of the governor’s seasoned staff members are helping Mr. Trump in Ohio, which no candidate since 1964 has lost and still won the White House....
docs.lead_paragraph: Almost none of the governor’s seasoned staff members are helping Mr. Trump in Ohio, which no candidate since 1964 has lost and still won the White House.
docs.abstract: Almost none of Republican Gov John Kasich's senior political staffers have offered their services to Donald Trump in his battle against Hillary Clinton in Ohio; refusals follow bitter feud between Kasich and Trump that boiled over during nominating convention in Cleveland; strategists say Trump's tough  chances of success in Ohio rest more on his campaign's fundamental structural problems than on lack of Kasich's operatives.

headline.main: Donald Trump’s Feud With John Kasich May Haunt Him in Ohio
headline.print_headline: In Must-Win Ohio, Trump’s Feud With Kasich Has Come Back to Haunt Him

headline.main: Now in Previews: Presidential Campaign Drama

docs.snippet: Mr. Trump is defending himself against claims that he donated $25,000 to a group supporting the Florida attorney general to sway her office’s review of Trump University....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump is defending himself against claims that he donated $25,000 to a group supporting the Florida attorney general to sway her office’s review of Trump University.
docs.abstract: Donald J Trump is defending himself against accusations he donated $25,000 to campaign group supporting Florida Atty Gen Pam Bondi in 2013 in effort to influence her review of fraud allegations at Trump University; incident is latest in decades-long string of attempts by trump to circumvent rules governing contributions and lobbying.

headline.main: Donald Trump’s Donation Is His Latest Brush With Campaign Fund Rules
headline.print_headline: Trump Donation  His Latest Brush With Fund Rules

byline.contributor: Kitty Bennett, Amy Chozick and Maggie Haberman contributed reporting.
byline.original: By STEVE EDER and MEGAN TWOHEY

docs.snippet: He gave Florida’s attorney general a campaign donation days after her office said it was reviewing allegations against Trump University....
docs.lead_paragraph: He gave Florida’s attorney general a campaign donation days after her office said it was reviewing allegations against Trump University.
docs.abstract: Editorial raises concerns about Donald Trump $25,000 campaign contribution to Florida Atty Gen Pam Bondi days after she announced her office would review allegations made in suit filed by New York attorney general against Trump University; notes Trump has already paid fine for improperly donating money from his family foundation; observes donation is in keeping with past claims by Trump of buying politicians.
